17.08.2006 AK SCR10924 added PI.MQDT_HOFF_CODE and PI.MQDT_HSUBGRP_CODE
-- OMQ157 is called 2 times for different MQ types and for every MQ type
separate permissions have to be fetched
@ Lock LC (active user) not necessary because only message has to be deleted
(unlock MQDT not necessary because MQ is already deleted)
Button "LC Detals" (also called if button "OK" and MQ157)
... lock not possible because LC is locked by an other user
... only if MQDT row still exists, could be deleted by another user and current
user didn't moved the cursor from parked row
... lock not possible because locked by another user or MQDT is already deleted
-- Delete message if LC is terminated = MQ158
-- Call OAD702 if MQ157 (Expired) --> same as done ifbutton"LC details"

ExpSyntax.val: (ISNULL ({0,14}) OR {0,14}='' OR {0,14}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,7},'M')>0
(ISNULL ({0,14}) OR {0,14}='' OR {0,14}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,7},'M')>0
